about_the_game:
This is a fighting action game. In this game, players can not only experience fighting, including training, passing levels, and player sparring, but also experience face-changing operations. Players can upload their favorite pictures, and then customize the uploaded character’s gender, age, and add animation effects. The generated avatar can also customize the hairstyle, and finally apply the generated head to the character, using a custom character Come to an exciting battle.

Instructions:
Player 1:
Control: W A S D
Light stamping: T
Light kick: G
Middle punching: Y
Middle kick: H
Punch out: U
Rekick: J

Player 2:
Control: Arrow keys
Light punch: insert
Kick: delete
Middle punch: Home page
Mid kick: end
Punch: Turn the page
Rekick: page down

Nirvana:
Fireball: down, forward, slam (any)
Dragon Fist: forward, downward, forward, slam (any)
Super fireball: down, forward, down, forward, tap
Super Dragon Fist: Down, forward, down, forward, middle punch
Custom combination 1: Light punch, light kick, medium kick, heavy kick
Custom Combo 2: Light Punch, Heavy Dragon Punch
Custom combination 3: Light fist squat, light kick squat, middle fist squat, squat middle kick, squat heavy kick
Custom Combination 4: Squat mid kick, squat heavy punch, jump, mid kick,
Middle punch, crouch heavy punch, super fireball
detailed_description:
This is a fighting action game. In this game, players can not only experience fighting, including training, passing levels, and player sparring, but also experience face-changing operations. Players can upload their favorite pictures, and then customize the uploaded character’s gender, age, and add animation effects. The generated avatar can also customize the hairstyle, and finally apply the generated head to the character, using a custom character Come to an exciting battle.

Instructions:
Player 1:
Control: W A S D
Light stamping: T
Light kick: G
Middle punching: Y
Middle kick: H
Punch out: U
Rekick: J

Player 2:
Control: Arrow keys
Light punch: insert
Kick: delete
Middle punch: Home page
Mid kick: end
Punch: Turn the page
Rekick: page down

Nirvana:
Fireball: down, forward, slam (any)
Dragon Fist: forward, downward, forward, slam (any)

Super Dragon Fist: Down, forward, down, forward, middle punch

Middle punch, crouch heavy punch, super fireball
name: DIY Lady Fighting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: This is a fighting action game. In the game, players can not only experience fighting, including training and passing levels. In addition to fighting, they can also experience face-changing operations. Players can customize their own characters and use their own characters for a wonderful fighting.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean
